mapper.insert: insert into user(id, pw, name, email, phone, home_tel, address, status) values (#{id}, password(#{pw}), #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{homeTel}, #{address}, #{status})
mapper.update: update user set id = #{id}, pw = password(#{pw}), name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, home_tel = #{homeTel}, address = #{address}, status = #{status} where client_num = #{clientNum}
mapper.select: select * from user where id = #{id} and pw = password(#{pw})
